headline: Is Philip Morris International a Good Value After 30% Rally and Smoke-Free Product Push?
summary: Wondering if Philip Morris International is truly worth its current price? You are not alone, as many investors are eyeing its value story with fresh curiosity. After gaining 30.0% year-to-date and delivering a strong 23.4% return over the past year, the stock has recently caught the attention of both momentum hunters and cautious analysts. Industry headlines have focused on regulatory developments and new product launches, each playing a part in shaping investor sentiment. For instance, the...
